<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_push_notif_msg_content"><sys_push_notif_msg_content action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>SLX Notifica Asistente en Ruta</name><push_app display_value="ServiceNow Request Application">ac7f61d273122300d63a566a4cf6a78b</push_app><script><![CDATA[(function buildJSON( /*GlideRecord*/ current, /*String*/ message, /*Object*/ attributes) {

    var layoutGen = new global.NotificationLayoutFieldGenerator();
    var text_01 = layoutGen.layoutField(current.getTableName(), current.sys_id, "number");
    var text_02 = layoutGen.layoutField(current.getTableName(), current.sys_id, "u_slx_tipo_evento");
    var text_03 = layoutGen.layoutField(current.getTableName(), current.sys_id, "u_slx_fecha_evento");

    var deepLinkGenerator = new global.MobileDeepLinkGenerator("Request");
    var link = deepLinkGenerator.getFormScreenLink("bcde1bba1b627590f14374ce0a4bcbe4", current.getTableName(), current.getValue("sys_id"));

    var json = {

        "Link": link,

        "Layout": {

            "Evento": text_01,

            "Tipo de Evento": text_02,

            "Fecha del Evento": text_03

        }

    };

    return json;

})(current, message, attributes);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_push_notif_msg_content</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>slx.bb</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-12-07 14:44:56</sys_created_on><sys_id>09c6b9d41b8b3d50f14374ce0a4bcb58</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SLX Notifica Asistente en Ruta</sys_name><sys_package display_value="RutaApp" source="3dd19a6e87ee3590dbaf21b6cebb35c6">3dd19a6e87ee3590dbaf21b6cebb35c6</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="RutaApp">3dd19a6e87ee3590dbaf21b6cebb35c6</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_push_notif_msg_content_09c6b9d41b8b3d50f14374ce0a4bcb58</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>slx.bb</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-12-07 15:08:20</sys_updated_on></sys_push_notif_msg_content></record_update>
